strings.string: Problem! Check log or squeezeslave -I output manually
Problem! Check Log or squeezeslave -L / squeezelite -l output manually
(Local playback AND controller only are both ON!)
(Local playback AND controller only are both OFF!)
Starting XSqueeze and Connecting to LMS
Please wait a moment...(up to 10 seconds)...
On OE/Linux/OSX you probably need to manually chmod +x the binaries
Shutdown - Stopping Local Player and Slideshow
Add some music and get things going...
Try manually configuring one in XSqueeze settings...
No server found in XSqueeze settings
LMS Auto discovery appears to have succeeded
You should be good to re-run XSqueeze now
Manually specify server (e.g. if you have changed default ports)
Server CLI Port (9090 unless you have changed it)
Server HTTP Port (9000 unless you have changed it)
Extra player arguments (see their documentation for these)
Enable this if you want to manually choose an audio output
Choose an audio output here (only if no sound/special needs)...
Use as controller for external Squeezebox only?
(NB - EXPERIMENTAL - Can cause XSqueeze to hang on exit)
(NB - If server discovery fails, use settings below...)
(NB - if audio discovery fails, manually input args above.)
(NB - Manually input the arguments in extra arguments above)
Factor to adjust volume sensitivity of AV-Receiver
